summary: Green checkmark on completed epics in Execute view: implementation meets all acceptance criteria. Checkmark appears left of epic title when all child tasks are Done; hidden for any non-Done state; updates in real-time via WebSocket→taskUpdated→Redux; uses text-theme-success-muted for light/dark consistency. Unit tests in BuildEpicCard (5 cases) and integration tests in ExecutePhase (3 cases) cover the scope.
